contact.title: Let's work together
contact.description: Ready to bring your ideas to life! Let's discuss your next project and create something amazing together.

about.title: About me
about.description1: Frontend developer with 1 year of experience in the IT field. I specialize in creating modern web applications using React, Next.js, Python, and Django.
about.description2: Over the past week, I've been actively learning Django and Python for backend development and have made 1 page in Django, as well as delving into Next.js to create full-fledged full-stack solutions. I have experience deploying projects on Vercel.
